T04D3979:258a-1: tsa tu rvam ga bha rma ts'a rya /
T04D3979:258a-3: chos spyod yan lag bzhi pa /
T04D3979:258a-4: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04D3979:258a-5: ston pa bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T04D3979:258a-6: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ni /
T04D3979:258a-7: snying po byang chub mchis kyi bar //
T04D3979:258a-8: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T04D3979:258a-9: skyabs gsum skyob pa bla med la //
T04D3979:258a-10: rab tu gus pas skyabs su mchi //
T04D3979:258a-11: rten gzung bar bya ba'i phyir skyabs su 'gro ba'i yan lag ste dang po'o //
T04D3979:258a-12: slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T04D3979:258a-13: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T04D3979:258a-14: thog med dus nas da lta'i bar //
T04D3979:258a-15: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis //
T04D3979:258b-0: lus dang @258b dang ngag dang yid sgo nas //
T04D3979:258b-1: sdig pa mi dge ci bgyis pa //
T04D3979:258b-2: ma lus 'gyod pas so sor bshags //
T04D3979:258b-3: slan chad ci nus bsdam par bgyi //
T04D3979:258b-4: rgyud dag par bya ba'i phyir sdig pa bshags pa'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o //
T04D3979:258b-5: slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T04D3979:258b-6: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs na //
T04D3979:258b-7: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T04D3979:258b-8: nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams dang //
T04D3979:258b-9: 'jig rten pa ni gang gis kyang //
T04D3979:258b-10: ma lus dge ba ci bgyid pa //
T04D3979:258b-11: de la rang nyid byed pa bas //
T04D3979:258b-12: lhag par dga' bas yi rang ngo //
T04D3979:258b-13: dge ba'i rtsa ba tshogs chung ngus bskyed pa'i phyir
T04D3979:258b-14: rjes su yi rang ba'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o
T04D3979:258b-15: // slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T04D3979:258b-16: ji ltar sngon gyi skyob rnams kyis //
T04D3979:258b-17: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir //
T04D3979:258b-18: byang chub mchog rab thugs bskyed pa //
T04D3979:258b-19: de ltar bdag kyang ma rnams phyir //
T04D3979:258b-20: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
T04D3979:258b-21: bla na med pa'i byang chub nges par bya ba'i
T04D3979:258b-22: phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i yan lag ste
T04D3979:258b-23: bzhi pa'o // mthar dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis don
T04D3979:258b-24: phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub mchog
T04D3979:258b-25: tu bsngo ba'i yan lag kyang bya ste /
T04D3979:258b-26: bdag gi bsod nams 'di yis ni //
T04D3979:258b-27: sems can thams cad ma lus pa //
T04D3979:258b-28: gdul dka'i sems ni rab zhi nas //
T04D3979:258b-29: 'gro ba'i bla ma thob par shog / ces bya ba'o //
T04D3979:258b-30: chos spyod yan lag bzhi pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang
T04D3979:258b-31: phyug chen po shr'i dza ga ti ma tr'a nandas
T04D3979:258b-34: // / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug de nyid dang /
